titleStmt.title: A catalogue of the library of books, French and English, of Mr. Peter Hushar, merchant of London, deceased which will be exposed to sale by way of auction, at Mr. Thomas Ward's house, upholster at the Boars-Head in Cornhil, on Wednesday the 18th day of November, 1685 / by Edward Millington, bookseller.
titleStmt.author: Millington, Edward, d. 1703.
